subproject.description: The project purpose is to support the establishment of “one-stop” outreach centre(s) for victims of gender-based violence and through this centre(s), provide basic health facilities, shelter, counselling, training and guidance for victims of gender-based violence. Training programmes for perpetrators of crimes as well as sensitisation/awareness programmes for the leadership, police, correctional services, security forces and judiciary will be run. The project also aims to facilitate a comprehensive and up-to-date study of violence against women in Lesotho as well as raise awareness among the public of gender-based violence through electronic and print media, training and workshops.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Measures to counteract Violenc
